section.title: Pre-requisites
section.para: The files: ext-loader*.jar and ext-parser*.jar are required in the ext sub-directory of the Mind C compiler directory.

section.title: Parameters
section.para: To activate the &productName; for a compilation, the options --ext-files or -E must be used with the mindc command line to provide the extension .ext files.

To provide several files to the Mindc compiler, either a list of files can be provided to the options --ext-files or -E, or the options --ext-files or -E can be used several times on the mindc command line.
